sentences: Neredukomma Srinivas, also known as Jai Srinivas, was a playback singer from the Telugu film industry.
He is well known for singing devotional songs in Telugu films.
Neredukomma Srinivas was born in Mandamarri village Manchiryal district of Telangana.
He did his early schooling from Singareni high school at Mandamarri in 1993.
Srinivas died on 21 May 2021, from COVID-19 complications at a private hospital in Secunderabad.
